allowClear.description: Values are allowed to be cleared.

animation.description: Whether to animate internal label changes.
animation.description_zh: 是否为内部标签变化添加动画。

defaultActiveFirstOption.description: Whether to highlight the first option by default
defaultActiveFirstOption.description_zh: 是否默认高亮第一个选项

defaultPopupVisible.description: Whether the drop-down box is enabled by default.

dragToSort.description: Whether tags can be sorted by dragging
dragToSort.description_zh: 是否可以通过拖拽为 Tag 排序

error.description: Whether it is an error state. (Deprecated, removed in the next major version, replaced with status='error')
error.description_zh: 是否是错误状态。(废弃，下个大版本移除，使用 status='error' 替代)

labelInValue.description: Format the value in the onChange callback. The default value is string, and when it is set to true, the value format is: { label: string, value: string }
labelInValue.description_zh: 设置 onChange 回调中 value 的格式。默认是string，设置为true时候，value格式为： { label: string, value: string }

popupVisible.description: Controls whether the drop-down box is open.

unmountOnExit.description: Whether or not to destroy the DOM structure while hidden
unmountOnExit.description_zh: 是否在隐藏的时候销毁 DOM 结构

inputValue.description: The value of the input box (controlled mode)

placeholder.description: The selection box defaults to text.

allowCreate.description: Whether or not to allow the option to create a new one by entry.
allowCreate.description_zh: 是否允许通过输入创建新的选项。

autoWidth.description: Set width adaptive. minWidth defaults to 0 and maxWidth defaults to 100%
autoWidth.description_zh: 设置宽度自适应。minWidth 默认为 0，maxWidth 默认为 100%

mode.description: Whether to enable multi-select mode or tag mode (tags recommend mode: multiple; allowCreate: true, this pattern will be removed in the next major release)
mode.description_zh: 是否开启多选模式或标签模式 (tags 推荐使用 mode: multiple; allowCreate: true 替代，下一大版本将移除此模式)

size.description: Selectors for different sizes. Corresponding to 24px, 28px, 32px, 36px
size.description_zh: 分别不同尺寸的选择器。对应 24px, 28px, 32px, 36px

:addBefore.description: Add an element before the selection box

:clearIcon.description: allowClear when configuring the icon for the Clear button.
:clearIcon.description_zh: allowClear 时配置清除按钮的图标。

:notFoundContent.description: What is displayed when there is no data
:notFoundContent.description_zh: 没有数据时显示的内容

:suffixIcon.description: Customize the selection box suffix icon.
:suffixIcon.description_zh: 自定义选择框后缀图标。

:arrowIcon.description: Custom arrow icon, set to null not to show arrow icon.
:arrowIcon.description_zh: 自定义箭头图标，设置为 null 不显示箭头图标。

defaultValue.type: string | string[] | number | number[] | LabeledValue | LabeledValue[]
defaultValue.description: The default value for the selection box

:dropdownMenuStyle.description: The style of the drop-down list.

:options.type: (| string| number| { label: ReactNode | string; value: string | number; disabled?: boolean; extra?: any })[]

:removeIcon.description: Configure the delete icon for the selected item when you select it multiple times. When null is passed, the delete icon is not displayed.
:removeIcon.description_zh: 多选时配置选中项的删除图标。当传入null，不显示删除图标。

showSearch.description: To make the single-select mode searchable, pass in { retainInputValue: true } to preserve existing content when the search box is focused, pass in { retainInputValueWhileSelect: true } to preserve the input box content when multi-select is selected.
showSearch.description_zh: 使单选模式可搜索，传入 { retainInputValue: true } 在搜索框聚焦时保留现有内容传入 { retainInputValueWhileSelect: true } 在多选选择时保留输入框内容。

:tokenSeparators.description: Separator for automatic word segmentation in multi-select mode.
:tokenSeparators.description_zh: 在多选模式下自动分词的分隔符。

:triggerProps.description_zh: 可以接受所有 Trigger 的 Props

value.type: string | string[] | number | number[] | LabeledValue | LabeledValue[]
value.description: The value of the selector (controlled mode)

:filterOption.description: Whether to filter the data based on the values entered. If you pass in a function, you will receive two parameters, inputValue and option, and return true when the option meets the filter conditions, and false if it does not.
:filterOption.description_zh: 是否根据输入的值筛选数据。如果传入函数的话，接收 inputValue 和 option 两个参数，当option符合筛选条件时，返回 true，反之返回 false。

:getPopupContainer.description: The parent node of the pop-up box.

:maxTagCount.description: The maximum number of tags to display, only valid in multi-select or tag mode.
:maxTagCount.description_zh: 最多显示多少个 tag，仅在多选或标签模式有效。

:renderFormat.type: (option: OptionInfo | null, value: string | number | LabeledValue) => ReactNode
:renderFormat.description: Customize echo content. The return value will be displayed in the drop-down box. If the option corresponding to the value does not exist, the first parameter is null
:renderFormat.description_zh: 定制回显内容。返回值将会显示在下拉框内。若 value 对应的 Option 不存在，则第一个参数是 null

:renderTag.type: (props: {value: any;label: ReactNode;closable: boolean;onClose: (event) => void;},index: number,values: ObjectValueType[]) => ReactNode
:renderTag.description: Custom label rendering, props is the current tag property, index is the order of the current tag, and values is the value of all tags.
:renderTag.description_zh: 自定义标签渲染，props 为当前标签属性，index 为当前标签的顺序，values 为所有标签的值.

:triggerElement.type: | ReactNode| ((params: { value: any; option: OptionInfo | OptionInfo[] }) => ReactNode)

events.name: onChange
events.description: Click the callback in the selection box

events.name: onClear
events.description: Triggered when you click Clear, the parameter is the expansion status of the current drop-down box.
events.description_zh: 点击清除时触发，参数是当前下拉框的展开状态。

events.name: onClick
events.description: Callback when the mouse clicks the drop-down box
events.description_zh: 鼠标点击下拉框时的回调

events.name: onDeselect
events.description: Callbacks that are triggered when unchecked, (only triggered in multiple mode).
events.description_zh: 取消选中的时候触发的回调，(只在 multiple 模式下触发)。
events.params: (value: string | number | LabeledValue, option: OptionInfo) => void

events.name: onInputValueChange
events.description: Callback for text changes in the input box.
events.description_zh: 输入框文本改变的回调。

events.name: onKeyDown
events.description: Callbacks when typing on the keyboard

events.name: onPaste
events.description_zh: 输入框文本粘贴的回调。

events.name: onPopupScroll
events.description: The scrolling listener function of the drop-down box is a scrolling element.
events.description_zh: 下拉框的滚动监听函数，参数为滚动元素。

events.name: onSelect
events.description: A callback that is triggered when the option is selected, (only in multiple mode).
events.description_zh: 选中选项时触发的回调，(只在 multiple 模式下触发)。
events.params: (value: string | number | LabeledValue, option: OptionInfo) => void

events.name: onVisibleChange
events.description: Triggered when the drop-down box is collapsed and expanded
events.description_zh: 下拉框收起展开时触发
